name: Deny VNet creation outside of Resource Groups based on a naming standard
description: This Policy will deny the creation of VNets outside of Resource Groups that follow a certain naming convention.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

The policy will concat this value with the provisioned resources location. Example, if you provide the value of '-example' the concat result will be like: 'eastus-example'. If the created resources location does not match this contact then Policy will deny the creation.
